snippet: PHOENIX — Arizona reported nearly 2,500 coronavirus cases and hospitalizations remained above 2,000 for the 10th straight day. The additional 2,480 confirmed cases and 62 deaths were reported Thursday on the state's coronavirus dashboard.

title: Selyn dresses Paralympic team, hand-woven with pride for Sri Lankans by Sri Lankans
snippet: Selyn officially sponsored and created the opening ceremony uniforms for the Sri Lanka Paralympic 2020 team. Watching the Sri Lankan team march the stadium of Tokyo on 24 August was not only a proud moment for the national team but also for the networks of artisans who made the traditional handloom opening ceremony uniforms for the Sri Lankan team at the Paralympics 2020.

title: COVID vaccine given to the oldest person
snippet: The COVID vaccine being given to 106-year-old retired farmer B.H. Manial, the oldest person in the Southern Province, at his Karandeniya residence by the area MOH Dr. Nadeep Sudusinghe yesterday. Karandeniya PS Chairman Gamini Amarawansa,

title: SLC commences residential training camps for Women's and U-19 cricketers
snippet: A residential training camp for 23 Sri Lanka women cricketers commenced yesterday to prepare them for future tours and the World Cup Qualifying Tournament. ..

title: T20I series: A test of skill for Sri Lanka's unstable batting
snippet: Sri Lanka winning their last T20I series against India may have given them the much-needed confidence booster following five consecutive series defeats, but South Africa - strengthened by the arrival of wicket-keeper/batsman Quinton de Kock along with hard hitting batsman David Miller and fast bowler Lungi Ngidi - will certainly start the three-match T20I series at the R.

title: Chandimal included in Sri Lanka's 19-man squad for T20 World Cup
snippet: Former Sri Lanka captain Dinesh Chandimal has been named in Sri Lanka's squad of 19 for the three-match T20I series against South Africa and the T20 World Cup in UAE and Oman. ..

title: Crisis and the nation's survival
snippet: Among probable disasters there are avoidable as well as unavoidable ones. Even in unavoidable disasters, the resultant damage caused can be minimised with prudent and timely action. ..

title: Sunil Perera, Outspoken King of Sri Lankan Baila Music, Is Dead at 68
snippet: The frontman of his family's popular band combined the country's unique, Latin-influenced sound with politically biting lyrics.

title: Chandimal included in Sri Lanka's 19-man squad for T20 World Cup
snippet: Former Sri Lanka captain Dinesh Chandimal has been named in Sri Lanka's squad of 19 for the three-match T20I series against South Africa and the T20 World Cup in UAE and Oman. A few months back it seemed like Chandimal's career in white-ball cricket was over when the selectors decided to ignore him for successive series against Bangladesh,

title: Corrugated carton industry leader Ex-Pack announces Rs. 700 m IPO
snippet: Sri Lanka's number one corrugated carton manufacturer Ex-Pack yesterday announce the unpacking of a new beginning, through its impending Initial Public Offering (IPO) and listing on the Colombo Stock Exchange.

title: The Latest: Biden to announce sweeping new vaccine rules
snippet: WASHINGTON — President Joe Biden is announcing sweeping new federal vaccine requirements affecting as many as 100 million Americans in an all-out effort to increase COVID-19 vaccinations and curb the surging delta variant that is killing thousands each week and jeopardizing the nation's economic recovery.
